title: 2BR Condo Unit for Salet in The Residences at Greenbelt, Makati
description:
Code: CP-WS




Welcome to The Residences at Greenbelt !




Sitting on top of a generously landscaped podium lined with restaurants and retail outlets, this high-end community comprises the Laguna, San Lorenzo, and Manila Towers. The first of three buildings is the Laguna Tower, a 48-story tower that was turned over in 2009. San Lorenzo Tower, the second, is the highest of the three standing at 204.5 meters. This 57-storey skyscraper was inaugurated in 2010. Standing at 170.75 meters is the third building, which is the 48-story Manila Tower. All three skyscrapers showcase a four-level podium with commercial establishments and three basement levels for parking. Regular units at The Residences at Greenbelt include 57-square-meter one-bedroom executive suites, 66-square-meter one-bedroom residences, 106-square-meter two-bedroom units, and 165-square-meter three-bedroom residences. Facilities include a adult lap pool, a kiddie pool, a children’s playground, an indoor play area, a fitness center, a spa, a mini-theatre, a game room, a pond, rock and water features, a Zen-inspired meditation garden, a sky deck on the 50th floor, a grand social hall, and a multipurpose lawn. Nestled along Antonio Arnaiz Avenue in Makati City, The Residences at Greenbelt is a short five minutes from the Makati central business district by car.




Unit features:

San Lorenzo Tower

Semi-furnished

2 bedrooms

2 bathrooms

1 parking slot

With direct access from the building to the shopping areas of Greenbelt via the bridgeway

title: 2BR Condo Unit for Sale in The Residences at Greenbelt, Makati
description:
Code: CP-WS




Welcome to The Residences at Greenbelt !




Sitting on top of a generously landscaped podium lined with restaurants and retail outlets, this high-end community comprises the Laguna, San Lorenzo, and Manila Towers. The first of three buildings is the Laguna Tower, a 48-story tower that was turned over in 2009. San Lorenzo Tower, the second, is the highest of the three standing at 204.5 meters. This 57-storey skyscraper was inaugurated in 2010. Standing at 170.75 meters is the third building, which is the 48-story Manila Tower. All three skyscrapers showcase a four-level podium with commercial establishments and three basement levels for parking. Regular units at The Residences at Greenbelt include 57-square-meter one-bedroom executive suites, 66-square-meter one-bedroom residences, 106-square-meter two-bedroom units, and 165-square-meter three-bedroom residences. Facilities include a adult lap pool, a kiddie pool, a children’s playground, an indoor play area, a fitness center, a spa, a mini-theatre, a game room, a pond, rock and water features, a Zen-inspired meditation garden, a sky deck on the 50th floor, a grand social hall, and a multipurpose lawn. Nestled along Antonio Arnaiz Avenue in Makati City, The Residences at Greenbelt is a short five minutes from the Makati central business district by car.

With direct access from the building to the shopping areas of Greenbelt via the Bridgeway

description:
Code: TL




Spacious 4BR Unit  For Sale at Ritz Tower Makati




*** For DIRECT BUYERS ONLY ***




Why Ritz Towers Is a Perfect Choice for You

The Ritz Towers in Makati City stands in a strategic location. As it is close to key establishments, residents find everything they need very accessible. If you make these twin towers your next home, you can simply walk to SM Makati or Glorietta for your weekend retail therapy or catch-up with friends. Greenbelt and Century City Mall are nearby as well. Top hospitals in the city are easily reachable, including Makati Medical Center, Medical Plaza Makati, and St. Clare's Medical Center.

As for schools, you won't have to drive long miles to get your kids to class. Reputable institutions are only a short drive away. A few international schools nearby include Reach International School, CIE British School, and International School Manila. For your children going to college, they can opt for Colegio San Agustin Makati, St. Paul College of Makati, or Assumption College, all located near Ritz Towers by SMDC. title: 2BR Bi-Level Condo Unit w/ Garden for Sale in The Residences at Greenbelt Makati
description:
JP-CP - D




Welcome to The Residences at Greenbelt !




Sitting on top of a generously landscaped podium lined with restaurants and retail outlets, this high-end community comprises the Laguna, San Lorenzo, and Manila Towers. The first of three buildings is the Laguna Tower, a 48-storey tower that was turned over in 2009. San Lorenzo Tower, the second, is the highest of the three standing at 204.5 meters. This 57-storey skyscraper was inaugurated in 2010. Standing at 170.75 meters is the third building, which is the 48-story Manila Tower. All three skyscrapers showcase a four-level podium with commercial establishments and three basement levels for parking. Regular units at The Residences at Greenbelt include 57-square-meter one-bedroom executive suites, 66-square-meter one-bedroom residences, 106-square-meter two-bedroom units, and 165-square-meter three-bedroom residences. Facilities include a adult lap pool, a kiddie pool, a children’s playground, an indoor play area, a fitness center, a spa, a mini-theatre, a game room, a pond, rock and water features, a Zen-inspired meditation garden, a sky deck on the 50th floor, a grand social hall, and a multipurpose lawn. Nestled along Antonio Arnaiz Avenue in Makati City, The Residences at Greenbelt is a short five minutes from the Makati central business district by car.

title: 2 Bedroom For Sale One Roxas Triangle, Makati City
description:
Overview of the Project:

One Roxas Triangle is a 51-story luxury residential condominium located in the heart of Makati City’s central business district, developed by Ayala Land and Hongkong Land, designed by the internationally renowned architectural firm Skidmore, Owings & Merrill to offer exclusive, low-density living with spacious units, top-tier amenities, and panoramic views, setting a benchmark for high-end urban living in the Philippines.







Key Building Features Architectural Design:

One Roxas Triangle is a 51-storey luxury residential tower in Makati City, designed by the world-renowned firm Skidmore, Owings & Merrill LLP, featuring a distinctive triangular layout that maximizes natural light, ventilation, and panoramic city views, while offering low-density living with only one to four spacious units per floor, supported by full backup power, high-speed elevators, 24/7 security, and top-tier amenities such as a swimming pool, fitness center, function rooms, landscaped gardens, and a helipad combining structural integrity, elegance, and privacy in one of Metro Manila’s most prestigious addresses.







Unit Configurations: 

One Roxas Triangle offers spacious, well-appointed residential units with configurations typically ranging from three bedroom to four bedroom layouts, with floor areas starting at approximately 280 square meters, designed to occupy only one to four units per floor to ensure maximum privacy, comfort, and exclusivity for residents.




Modern Finishes: 

Each unit at One Roxas Triangle features modern finishes, including premium-grade materials such as hardwood flooring, natural stone countertops, sleek cabinetry, imported tiles, and high-quality fixtures, all thoughtfully designed to reflect contemporary luxury and timeless elegance.

title: 3 Bedroom For sale in One Legazpi Park, Makati City
description:
Overview of the Project  

One Legazpi Park is a 45-storey residential condominium by Ayala Land Premier, located in Legazpi Village, Makati. It offers studio to 3-bedroom units and features amenities like a pool, gym, daycare, and function rooms. With 24/7 security and a prime location near Greenbelt and the Makati CBD, it provides a convenient and upscale lifestyle ideal for professionals, families, and investors.     




Key Building Features  It features high-speed elevators, 100% backup power, and a covered drop-off area for convenience. Safety is a priority, with 24/7 security, CCTV, fire protection systems, and earthquake-resistant technology in place. Residents enjoy complete amenities, including a swimming pool, gym, function rooms, daycare, and a scenic sky terrace. The building also incorporates eco-friendly elements like rainwater harvesting, energy-efficient lighting, and natural ventilation. With secure parking and a prime location in Makati, it offers both comfort and urban accessibility.     




Unit Configurations:   

One Legazpi Park offers studio (≈40 sqm), 1-bedroom (50–70 sqm), 2-bedroom (80 sqm), and 3-bedroom (up to 159 sqm) units. Designed for comfort and efficiency, all units feature quality finishes and large windows for ample natural light.     




Premium Finishes:   Units at One Legazpi Park feature high-quality materials, including hardwood or premium laminate flooring, stone countertops, and stylish wood-toned cabinetry. Bathrooms are equipped with modern fixtures and tiles, while large double-glazed windows provide natural light, insulation, and noise reduction—offering a refined and comfortable living experience.     




Safety and Convenience:  

The building offers 24/7 security, CCTV, concierge services, and secure access. It includes fire safety systems, backup power, and earthquake-resistant features. Residents also benefit from secure parking, high-speed elevators, and easy access to key areas in Makati’s business district.     




Facilities & Services:  

One Legazpi Park offers essential and lifestyle amenities, including a pool, gym, children’s play areas, function rooms, and a sky terrace. It also provides 24/7 security, concierge services, secure parking, backup power, and service elevators  ensuring comfort, safety, and convenience for residents.     




Amenity Deck: Spanning nearly a hectare, it includes:  

Swimming pool  Kiddie pool  Fitness gym

Function rooms     




Indoor Amenities:

One Rockwell West is a premium residential condominium developed by Rockwell Land Corporation, located in the heart of Rockwell Center, Makati. As part of the iconic One Rockwell complex, the West Tower is known for its distinctive architecture, spacious units, and luxurious amenities.




Key Building Features:

One Rockwell West features a striking 40-storey design by Arquitectonica, offering spacious units with floor-to-ceiling windows, double-height lofts, high-speed elevators, 24/7 security, backup power, and direct access to Power Plant Mall—all set within a green, sustainably designed building that provides panoramic views of the city.







Unit Configurations: One Rockwell West offers a variety of unit configurations, including studio (27–28 sqm), one-bedroom flats and lofts (51–71 sqm), two-bedroom flats and lofts (70–125 sqm), bi-level two-bedroom units (132–135 sqm), and three-bedroom flats (127 sqm), many featuring double-height ceilings and floor-to-ceiling windows.

title: Rare 3BR Penthouse Unit For Sale - Two Serendra
Condo for Sale in BGC, Taguig at The Bellagio Tower
4 Bedrooms For Sale in The Albany, Taguig City
description:
The Albany

Overview of the Project
The Albany sits along Le Grand Avenue at Chateau Road in McKinley West, Bonifacio Global City, Taguig. This ultra‑high‑end low‑density development is a two‑tower estate envisioned by Broadway Malyan, offering refined modern-European architecture and views of the Forbes Park and BGC skylines . Designed for exclusivity and smart living, each unit integrates full home automation, allowing lighting, HVAC, and appliances to be controlled via mobile phone—plus hands‑free motion sensor lighting in key areas. 


Key Building Features
Comprised of two mid‑rise clusters—Kingsley Tower completed Dec 2021 grace period and Yorkshire Villa (2023), each with around 64 units total 128 units. Low-rise, low-density estate offering generous spacious layouts: 2‑bedrooms (123 sqm), 3‑bedrooms (124 sqm), and 4‑bedroom penthouse suites (up to 349 sqm). Each unit includes a private balcony, high-end European fixtures, and full smart‑home technology. Residents enjoy secure, private elevator access directly to their units—especially for penthouse suites—and units are equipped with built‑in video intercoms connected to the lobby

Facilities & Services
24/7 security with CCTV
Key‑card access systems
FTTH cabling and building-wide high‑speed Wi‑Fi connectivity
Concierge/reception area, property management services, smoke/fire detection and backup power systems

Amenity Deck
Horizon-edge swimming pool with submerged lounge deck and cabanas
Separate kiddie pool and pool deck
Fitness center, sauna, wellness spa
Game/entertainment room, function halls
Kids’ play area and event rooms—all with complimentary Wi‑Fi

Nearby Establishments
Shopping & Dining
Situated within McKinley West near Lifestyle and retail nodes of BGC
Proximity to upscale leisure venues like Manila Polo Club and Forbes Park

Educational Institutions
International School Manila
The British School Manila
Assumption College (Makati)
Don Bosco Makati 

Healthcare Facilities
St. Luke’s Medical Center – Global City (minutes away)
Other major medical centers accessible via BGC and Makati corridors

Parks and Recreation
Adjacent to Manila Polo Club greens and McKinley Hill landscaped corridors
Near to Ayala Triangle and Poblacion dining zones with easy ride into Makati CBD

Property Specifications: 
Unit Type: 4 Bedroom Unit
Floor area: 349 sqm
Status: Full-Furnished
Parking: 4 slot
Total Contract Price: Php 180,000,000

title: PRE-SELLING AND RFO 2BR CONDOS IN TAGUIG | ACACIA ESTATES, DMCI HOMES | NEAR BGC, ARCA SOUTH
description:
Your Elevated Urban Sanctuary Awaits at Alder Residences by DMCI Homes
Discover the perfect blend of modern convenience and resort-inspired living at Alder Residences, the newest gem from DMCI Homes in Acacia Estates, Taguig.

Step into a vibrant community where every detail is meticulously crafted for your comfort and well-being. Alder Residences offers a refreshing escape from the city's hustle, without compromising on accessibility.

Why Choose Alder Residences?

Prime Taguig Location: Nestled within the prestigious Acacia Estates, you're just minutes away from Bonifacio Global City (BGC), McKinley Hill, and Arca South. Enjoy unparalleled access to major business districts, top-tier schools, world-class hospitals, and premier lifestyle destinations.

Resort-Inspired Amenities: Immerse yourself in expansive leisure facilities designed to cater to your every need. From sprawling swimming pools, lush landscapes, and invigorating fitness areas to dedicated play zones for kids and serene common lounges, every day feels like a vacation.

Lumiventt® Design Technology: Experience the signature DMCI Homes advantage! Our innovative design allows for natural light and ventilation to flow freely throughout the buildings and units, promoting energy efficiency and a healthier living environment.

Spacious & Thoughtful Unit Layouts: Choose from intelligently designed units – we have different types of spacious 2-bedroom units – each maximizing space and comfort. High-quality finishes and fixtures ensure a ready-to-move-in experience (for RFO units) or a fantastic foundation for your personalized home (for pre-selling units).

Trusted Developer: Invest with confidence in DMCI Homes, a developer renowned for its commitment to quality, timely delivery, and a legacy of building vibrant, sustainable communities for over 25 years.

Family-Friendly Environment: Acacia Estates is a master-planned community known for its safe, green, and family-oriented atmosphere, offering a serene contrast to the urban buzz.

Whether you're looking for:

A Ready for Occupancy (RFO) unit for immediate move-in,

Or a Pre-Selling unit as a smart investment for your future,

Alder Residences offers flexible payment terms and an excellent opportunity to own a piece of Taguig's most sought-after address.

Don't miss the chance to elevate your lifestyle. Inquire now to schedule a personalized online presentation or an exclusive site viewing!

CURRENT PROMO TERM: PHP 29,000/month for 36 months DP, balance through in-house, bank or cash.

Message now to inquire!

title: Signature 3 Bedroom Condo Unit in Aurelia Residences BGC for Sale
description:
𝗢𝘄𝗻𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗽 𝗼𝗳 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗿𝗮𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘁 — 𝗿𝗲𝘀𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗲𝗱 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗳𝗲𝘄.

𝖠 𝗉𝗋𝗂𝗏𝖺𝗍𝖾 𝗈𝗉𝗉𝗈𝗋𝗍𝗎𝗇𝗂𝗍𝗒 𝗍𝗈 𝗌𝖾𝖼𝗎𝗋𝖾 𝖺 𝖻𝗋𝖺𝗇𝖽-𝗇𝖾𝗐 𝖲𝗂𝗀𝗇𝖺𝗍𝗎𝗋𝖾 𝟥-𝖡𝖾𝖽𝗋𝗈𝗈𝗆 unit 𝖺𝗍 𝗔𝘂𝗿𝗲𝗹𝗶𝗮 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲𝘀 — 𝟥𝟥𝟪 𝗌𝗊𝗆 / 𝟥,𝟨𝟦𝟣 𝗌𝗊. 𝖿𝗍. 𝗈𝖿 𝖻𝖾𝗌𝗉𝗈𝗄𝖾 𝗅𝗂𝗏𝗂𝗇𝗀, 𝗈𝖿𝖿𝖾𝗋𝗂𝗇𝗀 𝗌𝗐𝖾𝖾𝗉𝗂𝗇𝗀 𝗏𝗂𝖾𝗐𝗌 𝗈𝖿 𝖡𝗈𝗇𝗂𝖿𝖺𝖼𝗂𝗈 𝖦𝗅𝗈𝖻𝖺𝗅 𝖢𝗂𝗍𝗒 𝖿𝗋𝗈𝗆 𝖺𝗇 𝖾𝗑𝗉𝖺𝗇𝗌𝗂𝗏𝖾 𝖻𝖺𝗅𝖼𝗈𝗇𝗒, 𝖺𝗇𝖽 𝗍𝗁𝖾 𝗊𝗎𝗂𝖾𝗍 𝗅𝗎𝗑𝗎𝗋𝗒 𝗈𝖿 𝖺 𝗌𝗎𝗇𝗋𝗂𝗌𝖾-𝗅𝗂𝗍 𝗆𝖺𝗌𝗍𝖾𝗋 𝗌𝗎𝗂𝗍𝖾.

𝗖𝗿𝗮𝗳𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝘁𝗵𝗼𝘀𝗲 𝘄𝗵𝗼 𝗿𝗲𝗰𝗼𝗴𝗻𝗶𝘇𝗲 𝘃𝗮𝗹𝘂𝗲 𝗶𝗻 𝗿𝗮𝗿𝗶𝘁𝘆, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗶𝗻𝘃𝗲𝘀𝘁 𝗶𝗻 𝘀𝗽𝗮𝗰𝗲𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗿𝗲𝗳𝗹𝗲𝗰𝘁 𝘁𝗵𝗲𝗶𝗿 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲.

𝖳𝗁𝗂𝗌 𝗂𝗌 𝗇𝗈𝗍 𝗃𝗎𝗌𝗍 𝖺 𝗋𝖾𝗌𝗂𝖽𝖾𝗇𝖼𝖾 — 𝗍𝗁𝗂𝗌 𝗂𝗌 𝖺 𝗌𝗍𝖺𝗍𝖾𝗆𝖾𝗇𝗍.

𝖳𝗁𝖾 𝖺𝗋𝗍 𝗈𝖿 𝖾𝗅𝖾𝗀𝖺𝗇𝖼𝖾.


✨ 𝗜𝗻𝗾𝘂𝗶𝗿𝗲 𝗱𝗶𝘀𝗰𝗿𝗲𝗲𝘁𝗹𝘆. 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗽𝗿𝗶𝘃𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝘃𝗶𝗲𝘄𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝘄𝗮𝗶𝘁𝘀.

title: For Sale: Hotel 101 Fort (BGC) Condo Hotel Unit – Sixth Floor
description:
For Sale: Hotel 101 Fort (BGC) Condo Hotel Unit – Sixth Floor




Investment Overview:

• Hassle-Free, Risk-Free Investment: A worry-free, passive income opportunity in a niche condo hotel market, ideal for OFWs and investors.

• Steady Passive Income: Earn a 30% share of gross room revenue, paid monthly by Hotel 101 management to the owner’s bank account, like a pension.

• 2024 Performance:

Generating fix income operational.

• Prime Location: Hotel 101 Fort is opposite SM Aura in BGC, near commercial and leisure hubs.

• No Maintenance Hassles: All utilities, furniture, fixtures, maintenance, repairs, and association dues are covered by Hotel 101.




Property Details:

• Newly Built (2024): A 21 sqm hotel room, part of 606 identical units in Hotel 101 Fort, an international chain by Double Dragon (founded by Sia and Caktiong of Jollibee and Mang Inasal).

• Unit Ownership: Comes with a Clean Certificate of Condominium Title (CCT) in the owner’s name.

• Management Agreement: The unit is leased and managed by Hotel 101, ensuring secured monthly income with no headaches for the owner.




• High Occupancy:

Hotel 101 outperforms competitors in occupancy rates.

Owner Benefits:

• 10 Free Stay Vouchers Annually: 5 nights at Hotel 101 Fort and 5 nights at any Hotel 101 branch (valued at ~₱40,000/year).

• Flexible Ownership: The owner can sell the unit anytime.




Why I’m Selling:

I own several units and am selling some to free up cash. This sixth-floor unit is a solid investment, named “Pamana,” offering a headache-free way to earn passive income.




For More Information:

learn about Hotel 101 and Double Dragon’s operations.

Contact me to discuss this investment opportunity!

title: Unfurnished 1-Bedroom Unit For Sale at Avida Towers One Union Place, Taguig City
description:
Floor Area: 36.16




Floor Level: 8th




Unit Type: 1BR




Furnishing: Unfurnished




Selling Price: Php 5,800,000




If you're looking for a new home that offers convenience, style, and modern amenities, then Avida Towers One Union Place is the perfect choice for you! Located in the vibrant Arca South district, this residential condominium offers a range of unit sizes and layouts to suit your lifestyle and needs. Whether you're a young professional, a small family, or an investor, there's a unit that's just right for you.

With its sleek design and impressive features, Avida Towers One Union Place is an oasis in the heart of the city. Enjoy a refreshing swim in the pool after a long day at work, stay fit in the fully-equipped gym, or simply relax in the landscaped garden. The building is also equipped with state-of-the-art security systems and ample parking spaces, so you can feel safe and secure in your new home.

But what really sets Avida Towers One Union Place apart is its prime location. Situated in Arca South, you'll have easy access to everything you need – from malls and restaurants to hospitals and schools. And with the development of Arca South as a new business district, you'll be in the center of the action, with plenty of career opportunities right at your doorstep.

Investing in a unit at Avida Towers One Union Place is not just a smart financial decision, but also a lifestyle upgrade. Experience the best of urban living with the comfort and convenience that this residential condominium offers. Don't miss out on this opportunity – contact us now to learn more about this amazing property!

Nearby Transportation


  South Luzon Expressway (SLEX) - A major expressway in Metro Manila, which connects to other cities and provinces in the south.

  Taguig Integrated Terminal Exchange (ITX) - A modern transportation hub where you can find various public transportation options, including buses, jeepneys, and vans.

  PNR FTI Station - A railway station that serves the PNR South Commuter Line, connecting Taguig to other parts of Metro Manila.

  Public Utility Vehicles (PUVs) - Taxis, Grab, and other ride-hailing services are also readily available in the area, providing convenient transportation options for residents.


Nearby Malls


  Ayala Malls Arca South - This mall is located right across Avida Towers One Union Place, making it an easy walk for residents. It features a wide range of shopping, dining, and entertainment options.

  SM City BF Parañaque - This mall is located about 10-15 minutes away from Avida Towers One Union Place by car or public transportation. It has a variety of shops, restaurants, and a cinema.

  SM City Sucat - This mall is located about 15-20 minutes away from Avida Towers One Union Place by car or public transportation. It offers a diverse selection of retail stores, restaurants, and entertainment options.

  Festival Mall - This mall is located about 20-25 minutes away from Avida Towers One Union Place by car or public transportation. It boasts a mix of local and international brands, a wide variety of dining options, and an array of leisure activities.

title: 1BR Condo for Sale in The Radiance Manila Bay, Pasay City
description:
Code: MP-CP




1BR Condo for Sale in The Radiance Manila Bay, Pasay City




*** For BUYERS ONLY ***




Welcome to The Radiance Manila Bay!




Illuminating historic Roxas Boulevard in Pasay City is the awe-inspiring The Radiance Manila Bay, a 36-storey, twin-tower condominium development of Robinsons Land Corporation. Designed with the urban family’s dynamic lifestyle in mind, this grand residential community features 1,068 modern and spacious one- to three-bedroom units ranging between 39 and 169 square meters. Basic unit features include an entrance panel door with viewer, ventilation for the kitchen and T&B, window-type air conditioner openings and electrical outlets, automatic smoke detectors and fire alarm system, and hot water supply line for the kitchen and T&B. Providing a genuine urban experience for its residents, The Radiance Manila Bay showcases an array of amenities such as an Olympic- size swimming pool, lap and kiddie pools, a fitness center, massage room, meditation garden, picnic grove, children’s play area, game room, karaoke room, and private theater. The Radiance Manila Bay also takes pride in its three-level retail building that houses a diverse selection of sophisticated brands.

title: Sunset View 1BR Condo for Sale at Avida Towers Prime Taft, Pasay City
description:
Code: CP-WS
 

 Welcome to Avida Towers Prime Taft !
 

 Avida Towers Prime Taft is one of the developments of Avida Land Corporation. It is strategically located in Vito Cruz, having access to fast-paced cities of Manila, Makati, and Pasay. School, work, and leisure are in perfect blend within the area. Choose among the studio, 1BR, and 2 BR units offered and indulge your downtime with various amenities such as the adult and kiddie pool, clubhouse, outdoor gym equipment, study room, open lawn, jogging path, sunset deck, and children’s play area. It is near to LRT1’s Vito Cruz and Gil Puyat stations as well as to different bus terminals. De La Salle University, College of St. Benilde, St. Scholastica’s College, Arellano University, and Arellano University School of Law are few stretches away; Manila Adventist Medical Center is within reach for medical assistance. Philippine International Convention Center, Cultural Center of the Philippines, and Ninoy Aquino Stadium are leisure sites that can be access easily from here.
 

 Definitely, Avida Towers Prime Taft is the cream of the crop for a convenient and comfortable urban refuge.

title: Spacious 4BR Condo for Sale in Horizon Homes at Shangri-La at The Fort, Taguig
description:
CODE TL-RS

‌

Spacious 4BR Condo for Sale in Horizon Homes at Shangri-La at The Fort

‌

Welcome to Horizon Homes!




Horizon Homes is a collection of 98 exquisite, luxury dwellings, serviced and managed exclusively by Shangri-La Hotel. Designed with utmost security and privacy in mind, residents have their own private driveway and lobby, and only five spacious units per floor served by four passenger lifts and one service elevator. Experience round-the-clock concierge, security, and medical personnel, to world-class culinary, sommelier, and housekeeping services; from exclusive Horizon Homes facilities, to exceptional dining and amenities across the hotel, retail arcade and Kerry Sports Manila.

With an expansive 8,000-square meter footprint spread over two floors, Kerry Sports is Manila contains an NBA-grade indoor basketball court, tennis courts, squash courts, an outdoor pool with entertainment and dining areas, extensive gym facilities with state-of-the-art equipment, studios for yoga, Pilates, dance, spinning and kickboxing, a wellness spa with massage and physiotherapy treatment rooms, as well as an Adventure Zone, designed for children of all ages.

Over 30 retail spaces are accessible from Bonifacio High Street and Shangri-La Hotel.

title: Uptown Ritz, BGC, Taguig - Corner 2BR Unit for Sale
description:
CODE CP-RS




2BR Corner Unit for Sale in Uptown Ritz, BGC, Taguig




Welcome to Uptown Ritz !




It’s your relentless pursuit of all things glamorous that makes Uptown Ritz Residence your address of choice. Here, all the residences are suites – large, luxurious spaces designed with the kind of style and sophistication that stands out and sets you apart.




Rising in Uptown Bonifacio, a live­work­play township in Fort Bonifacio, Uptown Ritz is where unforgettable experiences begin. And it’s where you realize that your life’s finest pursuits have now found a home.




With a grand lobby on the ground floor and low­ density large units occupying the residential levels, the seventh floor is dedicated to a comprehensive bi­level amenity deck. Here will be found a swimming pool complex with an in­pool lounge and wooden sundeck, bi­level gym and nursery, children's play area, business center and lastly, multipurpose function rooms fitting for glamorous social gatherings or elite corporate events.




This interpretation of modernity is all about the glitz and glamour; it is about the exclusive. Posh living has come to Manila. Live large at Uptown Ritz, the metro's glamorous face of luxury.

\

WELCOME HOME




A harmonious glow illuminates the dramatic entrance of Aurelia Residences, a signature design detail of the Philippines’ most coveted ultra-luxury residence.




Curated works of art evoke a delicate ambience of classic Italian elegance. A familiar face offers you a warm welcome.




From art, to design, to people: everything choreographed to perfection. Welcome home to Aurelia Residences.




WELCOME TO AURELIA




One of the most coveted addresses in the Philippines. A location defined by the extraordinary cosmopolitan skyline views and the lush greens of Manila Golf 




Club, Manila Polo Club and Forbes Park.

An unparalleled collaboration of architects, designers, and artisans who represent the pinnacle of their respective fields. A meticulously-curated vision inspired by sprezzatura – an effortless and understated sense of classic Italian elegance.







A limited collection of 285 bespoke residences at the heart of Bonifacio Global City, the fastest-growing central business district in the Philippines.




Welcome to Aurelia Residences.




AT YOUR FINGER TIPS




The heart of Bonifacio Global City is at your very fingertips at Aurelia Residences.

Located only minutes from Central Square, The Fort Strip, Bonifacio High Street, Burgos Circle and Uptown Mall: exploring the latest shopping and dining hot spots has never been easier - or as thrilling. All the best restaurants the city has to offer are just around the corner.




Retreat from the city or unwind after a productive week with a round (or two) of golf at the 6,325 yard championship course at the exclusive Manila Golf Club, or take some time out to enjoy one of the many events at the Manila Polo Club.

 Welcome to Horizon Homes!
 

 Horizon Homes is a collection of 98 exquisite, luxury dwellings, serviced and managed exclusively by Shangri-La Hotel. Designed with utmost security and privacy in mind, residents have their own private driveway and lobby, and only five spacious units per floor served by four passenger lifts and one service elevator. Experience round-the-clock concierge, security, and medical personnel, to world-class culinary, sommelier, and housekeeping services; from exclusive Horizon Homes facilities, to exceptional dining and amenities across the hotel, retail arcade and Kerry Sports Manila.

title: 1BR Condo in 8 Forbestown Road, BGC for Sale
description:
*** For BUYERS ONLY *** 
 

 Welcome to 8 FORBESTOWN ROAD! 
 

 Developed by Megaworld Corporation and designed by the Recio+Casas Architectural Firm, the 53-storey 8 Forbestown Road is the last residential project within the upscale 8 Forbestown Center in Bonifacio Global City. The building is ready for occupancy and offers homebuyers 1BR, 2BR, and 3BR units. A plus to some units is that they offer grand balcony views of the lush greens of the Manila Golf Course. Aside from the picturesque views, its wonderful range of amenities redefines luxurious living. Some of these grandiose amenities include a commercial mall, an infinity pool, landscaped gardens, a viewing deck, an outdoor spa, a kiddie pool, a paved sunbathing deck, a jogging path, children’s playground, a fitness gym, a tai chi station, changing rooms with showers, and function rooms. 8 Forbestown Road gives you anything you might need right at your doorstep and for the privileged few, this is definitely an opportunity worth investing in.

 Designed to surpass expectations, the Horizon Homes at Shangri-La at the Fort, Manila, are a collection of distinct homes that allow a privileged few to enjoy city living with the rare luxury of space and one of the breathtaking views around.
 

 Owners of the Horizon Homes will receive the Shangri-La hospitality they have come to expect from our hotels around the world – the same level of warmth, care, attention to detail, and service from the heart – delivered straight to their homes.

description:
Mosaic Tower 

Project Overview
Mosaic Tower is a 28-storey premium residential condominium located in the vibrant Legazpi Village, right in the heart of Makati’s Central Business District. Completed in 2011 and developed by Vista Residences, Mosaic Tower offers elegant ready-for-occupancy units that blend contemporary design with hotel-style comfort.
Perfect for professionals, couples, and investors, Mosaic Tower provides the luxury of city living with spacious units, top-notch amenities, and proximity to premier lifestyle destinations like Greenbelt Mall and Ayala Center.

Key Building Features

Mosaic Tower is known for its modern architecture with sleek glass facades and spacious balconies, offering panoramic views of the Makati skyline and nearby parks. Its strategic location near Greenbelt and Legazpi Park makes it an ideal choice for those seeking both comfort and convenience in the city.
Designed for stylish urban living, the tower features:
28 residential floors with studio, one-bedroom, and two-bedroom units
Artfully finished interiors with premium fixtures and flexible layouts
Floor-to-ceiling windows in select units for abundant natural light
Secure and low-density environment with a boutique residential feel

Facilities & Services

Building & Security
24/7 security and CCTV monitoring
Lobby with concierge and reception area
Three high-speed elevators

Ground floor commercial units for added convenience

title: Studio For Sale in Knightsbridge Residences, Makati City
description:
Knightsbridge Residences

Overview of the Project
A premium residential tower situated at the intersection of Salamanca Street and Kalayaan Avenue in Makati’s Century City development.Located just a few blocks from the Makati Central Business District, dining, shopping, and entertainment hubs, the building enjoys both prestige and convenience. It's approximately a 30‑minute drive from Ninoy Aquino International Airport. Designed by ASYA Design Partners in collaboration with the Jerde Partnership International (for master planning), and engineered by Aromin & Sy + Associates, the building features the striking "Lantern" concept—stacked glass‑box units with floor‑to‑ceiling windows that glow at nigh


Key Building Features
The tower rises to approximately 210 m with 60 aboveground floors and 4 belowground levels (some sources note minor discrepancies up to 62 above‑ground plus 5 sub‑levels).Designed as a high-end condominium, the units span a variety of floor plans and sizes. Though specific unit mix data is limited, the building’s layout and high ceiling heights speak to residential comfort and luxury appeal. The design inspiration reflects the upscale London neighborhood of Knightsbridge, signaling sophistication and elegance
.The Knightsbridge Residences delivers a harmonious blend of architectural distinction, luxurious amenities, and a premium location. From glowing glass facades to high‑ceilings and resort‑inspired facilities, the project exemplifies upscale residential urbanism in Metro Manila. Its proximity to commercial corridors, cultural nodes, and transport access makes it both a lifestyle statement and a smart investment.

Facilities & Services
24/7 security and CCTV surveillance

Experience the pinnacle of urban living at The Beacon, an iconic residential enclave in the heart of Makati City. Situated along Chino Roces Avenue, The Beacon offers a lifestyle of unparalleled convenience, luxury, and sophistication, making it the perfect choice for discerning individuals looking for the ultimate urban retreat.




Luxurious Residences:

Step into a world of luxury with The Beacon's meticulously designed residences. From sleek studio units to spacious one-bedroom and two-bedroom suites, each home is thoughtfully crafted to provide the utmost comfort and style, offering stunning views of the city skyline and modern amenities that cater to your every need.




Prime Location in Makati City:

The Beacon enjoys a prime location in Makati City, surrounded by the city's premier business districts, shopping centers, dining establishments, and entertainment hubs. With everything you need right at your doorstep, you'll experience the convenience of urban living at its finest.




Retail Paradise Nearby:

Indulge in world-class shopping at the nearby Greenbelt and Glorietta malls, where an array of high-end boutiques, gourmet restaurants, and entertainment options await. From designer fashion to culinary delights, these shopping destinations offer endless opportunities for indulgence and enjoyment.




Supermarket Convenience:

Experience the convenience of having premium supermarkets nearby, including Rustan's Supermarket and SM Marketplace. With a wide selection of gourmet delights and everyday essentials, grocery shopping becomes a pleasure rather than a chore, allowing you to enjoy more time for yourself.




Effortless Transportation:

The Beacon offers easy access to major transportation options, including major roads, highways, and public transit stations. Whether you prefer to drive or commute, getting around the city is a breeze, allowing you to explore all that Makati City has to offer with ease and convenience.




Educational Excellence:

Families at The Beacon have access to top-notch educational institutions such as the Asian Institute of Management (AIM) and Ateneo de Manila University Graduate School. With world-class schools nearby, you can provide your children with the best education possible in a safe and nurturing environment.




Amenities for Relaxation and Recreation:

Indulge in a lifestyle of luxury with The Beacon's exclusive amenities, including a swimming pool, fitness center, and landscaped gardens. Whether you're looking to relax or stay active, there's something for everyone at The Beacon, ensuring that every moment spent here is an opportunity to rejuvenate and unwind.




Good Investment Opportunity:

Investing in a property at The Beacon offers excellent capital yield and rental yield potential. With Makati City being a prime location for both residential and commercial properties, owning a unit at The Beacon is not only a wise investment decision but also a lucrative one, ensuring a high return on investment for years to come.




Your Gateway to Urban Luxury:

Don't miss the chance to make The Beacon your new home – where luxury meets convenience in the heart of Makati City. Whether you're seeking a place to call your own or an investment opportunity, The Beacon offers the perfect blend of style, convenience, and comfort.




Seize the opportunity to experience urban luxury like never before – arrange a viewing now and discover the allure of The Beacon!

title: For Sale Fully Furnished One Bedroom Unit at Kroma Tower (Tenanted) Makati
description:
Floor Area: 59sqm




Floor Level: 43rd




Unit Type: 1BR




Furnishing: Fully Furnished 




Selling Price: Php 14,000,000 




Occupancy: Tenanted




Kroma Tower is a luxurious residential high-rise building in Makati City, Philippines, known for its modern design and sleek facade. It offers a range of residential units, from studios to penthouses, designed with high-quality finishes and efficient layouts. Amenities such as a stylish lobby, fitness center, swimming pool, and landscaped garden provide comfort and relaxation. The tower's prime location offers easy access to commercial establishments, shopping malls, and transportation hubs, making it convenient for residents to enjoy the city's offerings while prioritizing safety and security.




Kroma Tower is a prestigious address in Makati City, Philippines, offering luxurious living in a modern high-rise building. With its sleek design and floor-to-ceiling glass windows, the tower provides breathtaking views of the city. The units, available in various sizes, boast high-quality finishes and modern fixtures. Residents can enjoy a range of amenities, including a stylish lobby, fitness center, swimming pool, and landscaped garden. The tower's prime location ensures easy access to commercial establishments and transportation hubs, providing residents with a convenient and vibrant urban lifestyle. Safety is a priority, with round-the-clock security personnel and advanced surveillance systems in place.




NEARBY TRANSPORTATION





  Metro Rail Transit (MRT): The nearest MRT station to Kroma Tower is the Guadalupe Station, which is a short distance away. The MRT system provides a convenient and efficient way to navigate through Metro Manila, connecting major business districts, shopping centers, and other key destinations.

  Public Buses: Numerous public bus routes pass through Makati City, offering residents easy access to different parts of the city and neighboring areas. The major bus terminals in the vicinity include the Guadalupe Bus Terminal and the Ayala Terminal, both of which are within a reasonable distance from Kroma Tower.

  Jeepneys: Jeepneys are a popular mode of public transportation in the Philippines, and they are readily available in Makati City. These colorful and uniquely designed vehicles traverse various routes within the city, providing affordable transportation options for residents.

  Taxis and Ride-Sharing Services: Taxis and ride-sharing services like Grab and Uber are widely available in Makati City. Residents can easily hail a taxi or book a ride through the mobile applications to reach their desired destinations with convenience and comfort.

  Private Vehicles: For residents who own private vehicles, Kroma Tower provides ample parking spaces, ensuring convenient parking facilities within the building premises.


NEARBY MALLS





  Greenbelt Mall: Located within the Ayala Center, Greenbelt Mall is a premier shopping complex known for its upscale shops, boutiques, and restaurants. It features a lush and beautifully landscaped environment with interconnected sections, namely Greenbelt 1 to 5, offering a wide range of retail options, from high-end fashion brands to international and local dining establishments.

  Glorietta Mall: Also part of the Ayala Center, Glorietta Mall is one of the largest shopping centers in Makati. It boasts an extensive selection of shops, including fashion boutiques, electronics stores, home furnishings, and entertainment options. Glorietta is renowned for its diverse dining scene, housing numerous restaurants, cafes, and food courts.

  Power Plant Mall: Situated in nearby Rockwell Center, Power Plant Mall is an upscale shopping complex that offers a unique shopping experience. It features a mix of high-end brands, designer boutiques, specialty stores, and a gourmet market. The mall also houses a variety of dining options, ranging from casual eateries to fine dining restaurants.

As a resident of Trump Tower Philippines, you will have access to world-class amenities, including a fitness center, spa, swimming pool, and concierge services. You will also be located in the heart of the city, with easy access to top restaurants, shopping, and entertainment destinations.

Investing in this stunning one bedroom unit is an opportunity not to be missed. Whether you are looking for a luxurious primary residence, a vacation home, or an investment property, this unit is sure to exceed your expectations and provide you with an unparalleled living experience. Don't miss out on this rare opportunity to own a piece of luxury at Trump Tower Philippines.

NEARBY TRANSPORTATION


  Taxis - Taxis are readily available in the area, and residents can easily hail one from the building's entrance or nearby streets.

  Ride-hailing services - Popular ride-hailing services like Grab and Uber are also available in the area, providing an affordable and convenient way to get around.

  Jeepneys - Jeepneys are a common mode of transportation in the Philippines, and there are several jeepney routes that pass through Makati, making it easy to travel to nearby areas.

  MRT-3 - The MRT-3 train station in Ayala is just a few minutes away from Trump Tower Philippines, providing access to other parts of Metro Manila.

  Buses - There are several bus routes that pass through Makati, providing access to other parts of Metro Manila.

  Walking - Makati is a pedestrian-friendly city, and many destinations are within walking distance from Trump Tower Philippines.


NEARBY MALLS


  Greenbelt Mall - Greenbelt Mall is a premier shopping destination in Makati, located just a few minutes away from Trump Tower Philippines. It features a wide range of luxury and high-end brands, as well as a selection of restaurants and cafes.

  Glorietta Mall - Glorietta Mall is another popular shopping destination in Makati, located adjacent to Greenbelt Mall. It features a mix of local and international brands, a food court, and a cinema.

  SM Makati - SM Makati is a large shopping mall that is also conveniently located in the Makati Central Business District. It features a wide range of retail stores, restaurants, and entertainment options.

  Power Plant Mall - Power Plant Mall is a high-end shopping mall located in nearby Rockwell Center. It features a curated selection of luxury brands, as well as a cinema and a variety of dining options.

  Century City Mall - Century City Mall is another shopping mall located within a few minutes of Trump Tower Philippines. It features a mix of local and international brands, a cinema, and a selection of restaurants.

Aside from its impressive design, Paseo De Roces Makati also boasts a wide range of amenities that will cater to your every need. Take a dip in the sparkling swimming pool, work out at the fully-equipped fitness center, or hold special events at the function rooms - all within the comfort and safety of your own home.

Location-wise, Paseo De Roces Makati is strategically situated at the heart of Makati, providing easy access to some of the city's most popular shopping centers, restaurants, and entertainment hubs. It is also near top-rated schools and hospitals, making it an ideal choice for families who want to live in a secure and convenient community.

So if you're looking for a luxurious and comfortable home in Makati, look no further than Paseo De Roces Makati. Come and experience the lavish lifestyle that awaits you!




NEARBY TRANSPORTATION


  Jeepney - The building is located along Buendia Avenue where jeepneys frequently pass by, providing a cheap and convenient way to commute around the city.

  Bus - The building is also near several bus stops along Buendia Avenue and EDSA, making it easy to travel to different parts of Metro Manila.

  MRT - The nearest MRT station is the Buendia Station, which is just a few minutes away from the building. From there, you can easily travel to other parts of the city.

  Taxi/Grab - Taxis and Grab cars are readily available in the area, making it easy to book a ride to your destination.

  Car rental - If you prefer to drive, there are several car rental companies nearby where you can rent a vehicle for your personal use


NEARBY MALLS


  Glorietta - This is a premier shopping destination in Makati City, located just a few minutes away from the building. It has a wide selection of local and international brands, as well as various dining and entertainment options.

  Greenbelt - Also located nearby is Greenbelt, an upscale shopping center that offers a mix of luxury and high-end brands. It also has a beautiful park and garden area that provides a relaxing environment amidst the bustling city.

  SM Makati - This is a large mall that features a department store, supermarket, and a variety of retail shops and restaurants.

  Landmark Makati - This is another popular shopping destination that offers a range of products and services, including fashion, beauty, and home essentials.

  Century City Mall - This mall is located just across the street from Paseo De Roces Makati and features a variety of shops, dining options, and a cinema.


NEARBY SCHOOLS


  Mapua University Makati - This is a well-known engineering and technology-focused university that is located just a few minutes away from the building.

  Colegio San Agustin - This is a Catholic school that offers both primary and secondary education. It is located in nearby Dasmariñas Village, just a short drive away from the building.

  Asian Institute of Management (AIM) - This is a prestigious graduate school of business that is located along Paseo De Roxas, just a few minutes away from the building.

  Makati Science High School - This is a public science high school located in nearby Kalayaan Avenue. It is known for its rigorous academic programs and focus on science and technology.

  Ateneo Professional Schools - This is a graduate school of business and law that is located in nearby Salcedo Village.

description:

Selling Price: Php 8,200,000







Kroma Tower Makati is the ultimate urban sanctuary in the heart of Makati City, Philippines. This luxurious residential tower offers a world-class living experience that combines modern design, luxurious amenities, and unparalleled convenience.

Located at the corner of Dela Rosa and Rada Streets, Kroma Tower Makati is just steps away from the city's most dynamic business and lifestyle districts, including Ayala Avenue, Legazpi Village, and Greenbelt. This means residents can easily access the city's top shopping centers, restaurants, cafes, and entertainment hubs.

The tower itself boasts of stunning architecture and elegant interiors that are sure to impress. Each unit is thoughtfully designed to maximize space, natural light, and ventilation, creating a welcoming and comfortable living space for residents. From one-bedroom units to three-bedroom units, there is a home for every type of resident at Kroma Tower Makati.

But it's not just the interiors that are impressive. Kroma Tower Makati also offers a wide range of world-class amenities that cater to residents' every need. These include a fitness center, swimming pool, landscaped gardens, and a roof deck with breathtaking views of the city skyline. There's also a function room and a business center for those who need to work from home or hold meetings with clients.

Finally, the security and safety of residents are of utmost importance at Kroma Tower Makati. The building features 24-hour security, CCTV monitoring, and a card access system, ensuring that residents can sleep soundly at night knowing that they are safe and secure.

title: Unfurnished Studio Unit at The Rise Makati
description:
Floor Area: 24.64 sqm




Floor Level: 10th




Unit Type: Studio




Furnishing: Unfurnished




Selling Price: Php 5,500,000




Welcome to The Rise Makati!




The Rise Makati is a luxurious high-rise condominium located in the heart of Makati, Philippines. It features modern and stylish architecture and offers spacious units with breathtaking views of the city. The building provides a wide range of amenities including a swimming pool, fitness center, garden deck, and function rooms. The Rise Makati is designed to provide residents with a comfortable and convenient living experience with its close proximity to numerous commercial establishments, offices, and transportation hubs.

Here are a few reasons why The Rise Makati is the perfect place for you:




Luxurious Living - The Rise Makati offers top-notch facilities and amenities, from the elegant lobby to the fully-equipped fitness center, swimming pool, and function rooms. You will also have access to the garden deck, which provides a peaceful retreat from the hustle and bustle of the city.




Convenient Location - The Rise Makati is located in the center of Makati, one of the most sought-after locations in the city. It's only a stone's throw away from the Central Business District, Ayala Avenue, and major transportation hubs like MRT and EDSA. You'll be close to numerous restaurants, cafes, and shopping centers.




Spacious Units - You'll be leasing a 2-bedroom unit at The Rise Makati, which means you'll have plenty of space to live comfortably. The units are designed to provide a modern and stylish living experience with ample natural light and breathtaking views of the city.




High-Quality Construction - The Rise Makati was built with quality materials and designed to meet the highest standards of construction. You can be sure that your unit is built to last and provides a safe and secure living environment.




TRANSPORTATION




MRT-3 - The Buendia Station of the MRT-3 is just a 10-minute walk from The Rise Makati. The MRT-3 is a rapid transit system that runs along the length of EDSA, making it easy to access other parts of the city.




Bus and Jeepney - There are several bus and jeepney stops located along Ayala Avenue and Buendia Avenue, which are just a few minutes away from The Rise Makati. These are affordable and convenient transportation options for getting around the city.




Taxis and Ride-Hailing Services - Taxis and ride-hailing services like Grab and Lalamove are readily available in the area, making it easy to get a ride whenever you need it.




Private Vehicle - If you have your own car or motorcycle, The Rise Makati is easily accessible via major thoroughfares like EDSA, Ayala Avenue, and Buendia Avenue. There are also several parking options available within the building.




NEARBY MALLS




Century City Mall - This is a high-end shopping mall that features a variety of retail stores, restaurants, and a cinema. It's just a 5-minute walk from The Rise Makati.




Power Plant Mall - This is a popular shopping destination that offers a range of shops, restaurants, and entertainment options. It's located in Rockwell Center and is just a 10-minute drive from The Rise Makati.




Greenbelt Mall - This is a premier shopping destination that offers a variety of high-end stores, restaurants, and entertainment options. It's located in the Ayala Center, which is just a 10-minute drive from The Rise Makati.




Glorietta Mall - This is another popular shopping mall located in the Ayala Center. It features a range of retail stores, restaurants, and entertainment options. It's just a 10-minute drive from The Rise Makati.

title: Fully Furnished One Bedroom Unit for sale at Trump Tower at Century City
description:
Floor Area: 80 sqm




Floor Level: 20th




Unit Type: 1BR 




Furnishing: Fully Furnished




Selling Price: Php 35,500,000




Welcome to Trump Tower at Century City Philippines, where luxury and elegance meet. I am delighted to present to you our stunning, fully furnished one-bedroom unit that is waiting for you to call it your own.

As you step into your new home, you will be amazed by the breathtaking panoramic view of the city skyline that can be seen from your living room. 




The space is thoughtfully designed with sophisticated and modern furnishings, including a plush sofa, a coffee table, and a flat-screen TV. The natural light that enters through the expansive windows creates an inviting and warm atmosphere that will make you feel right at home.




The fully equipped kitchen features state-of-the-art appliances, including a refrigerator, oven, microwave, and dishwasher, making cooking and entertaining a breeze. The sleek cabinetry and granite countertops provide ample storage space and add to the modern and luxurious feel of the unit.




The bedroom is a haven of relaxation, featuring a plush king-size bed with premium linens, ensuring that you get a good night's sleep. The en-suite bathroom is equally impressive, with marble countertops, a deep-soaking tub, and a spacious shower, providing you with the ultimate spa-like experience in the comfort of your own home.




Trump Tower at Century City Philippines offers an array of world-class amenities, including a 24-hour concierge, valet parking, a fitness center, and a stunning rooftop swimming pool. The building is located in the heart of Makati, one of the most prestigious and sought-after neighborhoods in Manila, offering you easy access to the best shopping, dining, and entertainment options in the city.




Don't miss this opportunity to own a piece of luxury in the Philippines. This fully furnished one-bedroom unit at Trump Tower at Century City Philippines is the perfect combination of elegance, comfort, and convenience, making it an irresistible investment for those who appreciate the finer things in life. Contact us today to schedule a viewing and experience the lifestyle you deserve.




NEARBY TRANSPORTATION


  Jeepneys - Jeepneys are a popular mode of transportation in the Philippines, and there are several jeepney routes near Trump Tower at Century City Philippines that can take you to various destinations in the city.

  Taxis - Taxis are also widely available in Makati City, where Trump Tower at Century City Philippines is located. You can easily hail a taxi on the street, or you can book one using a ride-hailing app like Grab or Uber.

  Metro Rail Transit (MRT) - The MRT is a rapid transit system that operates in Metro Manila. The nearest MRT station to Trump Tower at Century City Philippines is the Guadalupe Station, which is approximately 3 kilometers away.

  Bus - Buses are another option for transportation in Manila. The nearest bus stop to Trump Tower at Century City Philippines is the Ayala Avenue bus stop, which is about 1.5 kilometers away.

  Car rental - If you prefer to have your own car, there are several car rental services available in Manila that you can use to rent a car for your stay.


NEARBY MALLS





  Century City Mall - This mall is located right next to Trump Tower at Century City Philippines and offers a wide range of shopping and dining options, as well as a movie theater.

  Power Plant Mall - This upscale mall is located in Rockwell Center, which is about 3 kilometers away from Trump Tower at Century City Philippines. It offers a variety of high-end stores, restaurants, and a cinema.

  Greenbelt Mall - This mall is located in the Ayala Center in Makati City, which is about 4 kilometers away from Trump Tower at Century City Philippines. It offers a variety of shops, restaurants, and entertainment options, including a cinema and a park.

Lerato Makati" refers to a modern and upscale residential development located in the bustling central business district of Makati City, Philippines. The project was developed by Alveo Land, one of the country's leading real estate developers, and was completed in 2018.

Lerato Makati is composed of three residential towers, namely: Tower 1, Tower 2, and Tower 3. Each tower offers spacious and well-designed units that range from studio to three-bedroom apartments. The complex also features a wide range of amenities such as a fitness center, swimming pool, landscaped gardens, function rooms, and a roof deck.

One of the standout features of Lerato Makati is its strategic location. The development is situated near major transportation hubs, commercial centers, and lifestyle destinations, making it a highly desirable address for urban professionals, young families, and expats. It is also just a short distance away from some of Makati's iconic landmarks such as Ayala Triangle Gardens, Greenbelt Mall, and Glorietta Mall.

Overall, Lerato Makati offers a luxurious and comfortable lifestyle in the heart of one of the Philippines' most dynamic and cosmopolitan cities.

Live right in the heart of Makati’s creative and commercial district with this affordable 1-bedroom condo at San Antonio Residence — designed for young professionals, OFWs, and smart investors.

3 Bedroom For Sale In Salcedo Park, Makati City
description:
Overview of the Project:

Salcedo Park residential development in Salcedo Village, Makati City, offering spacious units, resort-style amenities, and a prime location near Salcedo Park and the Makati central business district.




Key Building Features Architectural Design:

Salcedo Park feature a sleek modernist design by Recio + Casas, highlighted by clean vertical lines, floor-to-ceiling windows, and a dramatic seven-story cascading waterfall at the podium level.







Unit Configurations: The Salcedo Park feature a low-density unit layout with just three residences per floor: one spacious 4-bedroom unit  and two 3-bedroom units , offering privacy and generous living space 







Modern Finishes: Units at the Salcedo Park Towers feature modern and luxurious finishes, including marble flooring in living and dining areas, mahogany hardwood floors in bedrooms, high-quality built-in cabinetry and kitchen systems, whirlpool jacuzzis in master baths, and floor-to-ceiling glass windows with plantation shutters for enhanced natural light and elegance.

title: 1 Bedroom Condo Unit for sale at The Rise Makati by Shang Properties Ayala Ave
description:
The Rise in North Makati or NoMa will be Shang Properties’ 3rd condominium project in Makati. Its 3,044 residential units sit atop a two-level boutique mall that will feature cafes, convenience stores, and other services that will offer residents comfortable and stylish living without needing to venture far away.




At 59 storeys high, The Rise will offer innovative lifestyle choices in a dynamic neighborhood teeming with galleries, delicatessens and bistros, indie music venues and unique retail destinations. Among The Rise’s unique amenities is The Hangout, a 300 square meter open lounge for entertaining friends and loved ones.




For meetings and school or work-related activities, there is The Workshop that offers an IT bar, a library, reading room, meeting rooms and other quiet nooks and spaces. The Nest, on the other hand, is designed for wellness and relaxation, a welcome refuge from the hustle and bustle of city life. It is one’s very own private space within the building that is perfect for a good read or for just hanging around and curling up.




Other project features include a tropical pool and children’s pool, a jogging trail, children’s play space, barbecue patio, and a fully equipped and modern gym.




H E A L T H  &  M E D I C A L




The best hospitals and medical facilities in the country are conveniently located very near The Rise Makati, including the renowned  Makati Medical Center, St. Clare Medical Center 




S C H O O L S  &  U N I V E R S I T I E S




Makati is the ideal neighborhood for young professionals, with some of the most prestigious schools in the country within walking distance - such as Don Bosco, CEU Makati, Mapua University Makati, St. Paul School of Makati and Colegio San Agustin Makati.




S H O P P I N G  &  D I N I N G




Access the ﬁnest shopping, entertainment, and dining experiences Manila has to offer from your base at Makati. Delight in the markets of Glorietta, revel in the latest and greatest international brands at Greenbelt, and explore and discover new retail experiences across a range of other malls like Circuit Makati , and SM Makati - all at your very ﬁngertips.




Our proposed development will be a Sixty Three (63) storey residential & commercial with units ranging from studio, one (1), two (2) bedrooms, as well as a residential lobby and one (1) floor of amenities and facilities. 2 floors botique mall.  




FIRST COME, FIRST SERVED BASIS.




Call or message me anytime.




I'll be more than happy to assist you.




See you! Book your reservations now!




Be the First to Own Your Property for Keeps

title: 3 Bedroom Rockwell Proscenium Condominium For Sale in Makati City
description:
FOR SALE




The Proscenium at Rockwell

Rockwell Center, Makati City, Metro Manila




3 Bedrooms 3.5 T&B 162 sqm

- Master's Bedroom has a Walk-in Closet

- with 2 Parking Slots (Tandem)

- All Units with Ensuite Bathrooms

- With Powder Room for Guests

- A Kitchen Door was added by the Owner

- with Maid’s / Utility Area

- with Rental Income (Great for investors!) 

- The buyer must honor the 1 year lease contract. Current lease contract started around Holy Week of 2024

- Low Floor




Accepting Offers from PHP 70,000,000 above

Kindly set viewings 1 week in advance, Thank you!




The Proscenium at Rockwell is a premier luxury condominium development located in the exclusive Rockwell Center, Makati. Designed by internationally renowned architect Carlos Ott, the Proscenium is composed of five architecturally distinct residential towers: Kirov, Sakura, Lincoln, Lorraine, and The Proscenium Residences. These towers offer low-density living with spacious units ranging from studios to expansive three-bedroom suites, ideal for individuals or families seeking privacy, comfort, and elegance.




Spanning 3.6 hectares, the development features a unique blend of upscale amenities. Residents enjoy access to a 1-hectare amenity deck with multiple pools, a Floating River, tennis courts, landscaped gardens, and a grand lawn. A 600-seat performing arts theater highlights the development’s cultural sophistication, while fully equipped gyms, themed lounges, and function rooms support wellness and social activities. Each tower includes exclusive lounges and libraries, reflecting its unique design theme.




Strategically positioned, the Proscenium offers direct access to Power Plant Mall via a pedestrian bridge, providing residents with premium retail, dining, and entertainment options. Its central location near J.P. Rizal Avenue and Estrella Street ensures excellent connectivity to Makati’s business district, top schools, and other key establishments.




Enhanced with advanced security systems, 100% backup power, and concierge-level services, the Proscenium delivers luxury, convenience, and safety. It is an ideal investment for those seeking refined urban living in one of Metro Manila’s most desirable communities.




DS88-004078

Welcome to your new home in the heart of Makati! This luxurious 3-bedroom furnished condo in Skyland Plaza offers everything you need for a comfortable and sophisticated lifestyle. Experience luxury living in this beautifully furnished 3-bedroom condo located in the prestigious Skyland Plaza, Makati. This spacious unit offers a floor area of 137 sqm, providing ample space for relaxation and entertainment. The condo features 3 bedrooms, perfect for a family, and 2 well-appointed toilets and baths.




The unit also includes a maid's room with its own toilet and bath, ensuring convenience and privacy for your household help. Enjoy the breathtaking views of Makati from your private balcony, or relax in the comfort of your furnished living space.




Parking is never a concern, as this unit comes with its own parking slot. With its prime location, Skyland Plaza offers easy access to Makati's business districts, shopping centers, restaurants, and entertainment hubs.

description:
COAST RESIDENCES – ROXAS BLVD. MANILA

Standing 41 stories high and adorned with a seagull-inspired design on its façade, Coast makes a striking landmark for residents and guests alike.

Coast Residences has an exclusive Sunset Lounge with a Game Room on the 41st floor are designed with floor-to-ceiling windows allowing natural light to fill the spaces. Coast Residences embraces the full beauty of its waterfront location with a breathtaking pool and view deck facing Manila Bay.

title: Aurelia Residences 3 Bedroom Deluxe Unit for Sale in BGC Taguig beside Forbes
description:
Aurelia Residences: An Icon of Bespoke Luxury in Bonifacio Global City
Aurelia Residences emerges as the pinnacle of ultra-luxury living in the Philippines, a highly anticipated development by Shang Robinsons Properties, Inc. – a visionary joint venture between Shang Properties, Inc. and Robinsons Land Corporation. This limited collection of 285 bespoke residences is meticulously crafted to offer an unparalleled living experience, inspired by the Italian concept of "sprezzatura" – an effortless and understated sense of classic elegance.

Prestigious Awards & Recognition
Aurelia Residences has already garnered significant acclaim, a testament to its world-class design and exceptional quality:

2023 Best High-Rise Condo Development in Asia (18th PropertyGuru Asia Property Awards)

2023 Best Ultra Luxury Condo in Metro Manila (11th PropertyGuru Philippines Property Awards)

2023 Best Condo Development Philippines (11th PropertyGuru Philippines Property Awards)

Unrivaled Location with Breathtaking Views
Located at McKinley Parkway corner 5th Avenue in Bonifacio Global City (BGC), Taguig, Aurelia Residences commands one of the most coveted addresses in the country. Residents will enjoy extraordinary cosmopolitan skyline views, complemented by the lush green expanse of the Manila Golf & Country Club, Manila Polo Club, and Forbes Park. This prime location offers:

Seamless Accessibility: Effortless connections to the Makati CBD, Forbes Park, Dasmariñas Village, EDSA, and the Manila International Airport.

Proximity to Lifestyle Hubs: Minutes away from BGC's premier shopping and dining destinations including Central Square, The Fort Strip, Bonifacio High Street, Burgos Circle, and Uptown Mall.

Convenience: Close to international schools and world-class hospitals.

A Collaboration of Global Design Maestros
Aurelia Residences is a masterpiece born from the collaboration of globally renowned experts:

Architecture: Skidmore, Owings & Merrill (SOM)

Interior Design: FM Architettura d'Interni

Landscape Design: URBIS Limited

Architect of Record: RCHITECTS, INC.

This synergy ensures every detail, from the grand lobby to the intricate unit finishes, reflects the highest standards of luxury and sophistication.

Exquisite and Spacious Residences
Aurelia Residences offers an exclusive selection of expansive units, designed for discerning individuals who value space, privacy, and refined aesthetics. All units feature a private lift lobby for ultimate exclusivity.

Unit Types & Floor Areas:
Three-Bedroom Deluxe: Approx. 240–242 sqm

Three-Bedroom Premier A: Approx. 259–284 sqm

Three-Bedroom Premier B: Approx. 271–293 sqm

Three-Bedroom Signature: Approx. 335–339 sqm

Four-Bedroom Signature: Approx. 399 sqm

Penthouse Deluxe: Approx. 605 sqm + Roof Garden

Penthouse Premier: Approx. 606 sqm + Roof Garden

The Aurelia Penthouse: Approx. 545 sqm + Roof Garden

Note: All units from Level 3 and up feature balconies. Price is unit only + VAT.

Over 5,000 sqm of World-Class Amenities
Aurelia Residences boasts an extensive collection of over 5,000 square meters of exclusive, meticulously curated amenities spread across various levels, promising a resort-inspired lifestyle within the city.

Key Amenities Include:
Resort-Style Pools: Luxurious 40-meter resort pool, kids' pool, and jacuzzi.

Wellness Facilities: Fully equipped fitness gym, sauna rooms for ultimate relaxation.

Social & Entertainment Spaces: Luxurious home cinema, comfortable and stunning lounges throughout the wings and amenities floors, and the elegant Canopy Room (a multipurpose function space opening to the poolside).

Family & Children's Areas: Indoor and outdoor kids' play areas designed for modern families.

Outdoor Spaces: Lush gardens, pet garden, and a jogging path.

Private Services: Carwash Bay in the basement, private lift access for all units (max 2 units per floor per wing).

Unwavering Security & Professional Management
24/7 Security: With RFID vehicle access and video intercom system for enhanced peace of mind.

100% Backup Power: Ensuring uninterrupted living.

Professional Management: All amenities and services are carefully managed and curated by Shang Robinsons Properties, Inc.

A Coveted Address Nearing Completion
Having celebrated its Topping Off Ceremony on January 24, 2024, Aurelia Residences is progressing steadily towards its turnover. This pre-selling opportunity allows you to acquire a timeless investment in one of the most prestigious addresses in the Philippines.

Experience the epitome of refined urban living. Welcome home to Aurelia Residences.

Message us today for more information, to inquire about available units, or to schedule a private viewing of the show suite!

title: The Veranda Arca South Studio For Sale, with 1 Parking, IKEA Furnished
description:
ARCA SOUTH: the next BGC located in East Service Road Taguig City

Strategically located near NAIA 3 and Bonifacio Global City, it will soon be a transport-friendly city with its own Ayala Malls, a world-class Bus Terminal, its own Metro Manila Subway Station, and a very-soon-to-open Landers Superstore and a discount-complementary Caltex Gas Station.

This booming district will have its own High Street commercial component, and will soon house major companies such as Aboitiz, Makati Development Corporation (now operational), and other high-profile business entities, ensuring the high growth and robustness of this soon-to-be major destination.




Features and Amenities of The Veranda by Alveo Land:

> Very Spacious Open-Type hallways and transparent fiberglass roofs to give you maximum natural lighting and air flow

> A very wide Pool, Park and Play area similar to Serendra BGC (see amenities photos to appreciate)

> Gym, Indoor Children's Playroom in the near future

> 24/7 Concierge and Security Roving

> Retail shops soon at the ground level

> Family and Interactive Parks just in front of the property, which are connected to the future Arca South version of High Street




The property is..

> a big 30 sqm tudio Unit located on the 8th floor of East Veranda, an Alveo-made residential enclave

> has a Nice View of Arbor Lanes, an Ayala Premier residential enclave

> a Fully Furnished unit with almost all IKEA Furnishings

Dining Table and Chairs

TV Table

Side Table

Central Lamp and Side Lamp

8-slot Standing Open Shelf

SALEM Queen Bed with Pull-Out Single bed

Bathroom 4-slot Standing Rack

Standing 6-foot 4-Door Cabinet

> has Appliances that Include the following:

Brand New Hanabishi 1.5HP Window-Type Aircon

TCL 50" TV

Whirlpool Front-Load Washer/Dryer (worth 42k)

Rhett Shower Heater

American Home Microwave

Haier Inverter Type 8cu.ft Refrigerator

La Germania Range Hood

Brand New Induction Cooker with Pots and Pans


Currently Tenanted with Rental Income of P11,500 per month until December 2025.


Friendly Terms: Downpayment of 2.7M straight, then Bank Loanable balance of 4.95M which gives you about p50k per month amortization, like you're on a RENT TO OWN installment plan.



For more inquiries and viewing appointments, feel free to contact me.

Only Direct Long-Term Tenants and PRC-Licensed Brokers will be entertained, no to colorums and AirBNB offers. PDC's required and 6-month minimum contract.

Thank you and God bless!

title: Nice 2BR Fully Furnished Unit for Sale in Central Park West, BGC, Taguig
description:
CODE CP-RS
 

 

 Nice 2BR Fully Furnished Unit for Sale in Central Park West, BGC, Taguig”
 

 Welcome to Central Park West !
 

 Central Park West is the second residential tower in this well-planned complex after the overwhelming success of Park West. It is located along 7th Avenue in The Fort, Taguig, right across the New York’s Central Park-inspired Big Apple Park.
 Central Park West will surely compliment the contemporary architecture of 5-star Grand Hyatt Hotel. It is an impressive glass structure with an oblong shape to maximize the views and natural lighting.
 

 Residents can finally enjoy their privacy as Central Park West boasts a low- density floor plan offering a maximum of 14 residential suites per floor. All units at Central Park West also come with a balcony, so you can enjoy the scenic view of Big Apple Park, or the glittering lights of Bonifacio Global City, Makati or Ortigas.

 Fully furnished
 Views – Four Seasons pool area and Mitsukoshi Mall
 2 bedrooms
 2 balconies
 2 bathrooms
 1 parking slot
 Floor area 58 sqm
 

 Near:

 Park West
 Uptown Mall
 Landers

description:
JP-CP
 

 Welcome to 8 FORBESTOWN ROAD!
 

 Developed by Megaworld Corporation and designed by the Recio+Casas Architectural Firm, the 53-storey 8 Forbestown Road is the last residential project within the upscale 8 Forbestown Center in Bonifacio Global City.
 

 The building is ready for occupancy and offers homebuyers 1BR, 2BR, and 3BR units. A plus to some units is that they offer grand balcony views of the lush greens of the Manila Golf Course. Aside from the picturesque views, its wonderful range of amenities redefines luxurious living. Some of these grandiose amenities include a commercial mall, an infinity pool, landscaped gardens, a viewing deck, an outdoor spa, a kiddie pool, a paved sunbathing deck, a jogging path, children’s playground, a fitness gym, a tai chi station, changing rooms with showers, and function rooms.
 8 Forbestown Road gives you anything you might need right at your doorstep and for the privileged few, this is definitely an opportunity worth investing in.

 2 bedrooms

description:
Discover luxury living at Grand Hyatt Residences North with this 300 sqm unit. This beautifully upgraded home features 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, and 3 parking slots for your convenience. Enjoy breathtaking views of the Makati skyline from your private balcony. The unit boasts high-end finishes and top-of-the-line appliances from Sub-Zero and Miele, ensuring both style and functionality. Priced at Php 184,000,000 (VAT included).

  Location: Grand Hyatt Residences North, BGC, Taguig
 Floor Area: 300 sqm
 Bedrooms: 3
 Bathrooms: 3
 Parking Slots: 3

 Features & Highlights:

 Spacious Interiors: With 300 sqm of living space, this home is designed for those who appreciate elegance and spacious living.
 Prime Location: Situated within the Grand Hyatt Residences North, you’re just steps away from world-class amenities, dining, and shopping experiences in the heart of Bonifacio Global City.
 Spectacular Views: Enjoy panoramic views of the Makati skyline, especially mesmerizing during sunset, from the comfort of your own balcony.

title: Best View! 2BR Condo for Sale in The Venice Luxury Residences, Taguig
description:
AV-CP
 

 *** For BUYERS ONLY ***
 

 Welcome to The Venice Luxury Residences !
 

 Live the Venetian experience in The Venice Luxury Residences, an extraordinary address in the biggest township development of Megaworld, Mckinley Hill Fort Bonifacio. Be captivated with Venetian influenced facades of its seven towers, 31-storey high residential condominiums. Commune not only in its pure serenity, but the best of Venice has to offer with the lively carnival of boutiques, dining places, cinemas, gardens, and upscale mall. Marvel with romance as you drift in a gondola on the country’s first-ever man-made Grand Canal. The Venice offers an array of units from executive studio, 1BR, 2BR, and 3BR unit types, while feasting your senses on the beauty of your surroundings from your balcony. You and your family can relax in the tranquil settings of sculpture, rock, and meditation gardens. Indulge to rest and recreation with its amenities: swimming pool, fitness station, play area, tennis and badminton courts, outdoor spa, playground, palm court, pond, and fountains. Every day, the magnificence of Venice colors your way of life at The Venice Luxury Residences.

 3 bathrooms
